Better Product Better Value. KarEbinR.

We can advise you on the best solution for your needs, offer professional installation from experienced fitters and all at a competitive cost. Our expertise covers all kinds of permanent and temporary hygienic solutions whether PVC or any other material.

PVC wall cladding has become more popular than traditional methods as it offers a range of basic to designer finishes and is particularly appealing due to it’s hygiene qualities. With an ever growing range of options it’s clear to see why our business is going from strength to strength.

Our Team of Experts will Keep You In Safe Hands

You’ll know your on safe hands with our expert team from start to finish as we advise and work with you from a conceptual stage through to completion. It will feel like you have your own expert on your team in house but without the added expense

Our material comes from stock or our network of distributors on a next day service to ensure your job is completed timely and efficiently

If your project is not running to plan for whatever reason, you’ll find that we’re flexible and will be there to assist to help you overcome any obstacles you may encounter

We have established an impressive client base spanning the entire UK which include major retailers, hospitals, nursing homes, gymnasiums, sports facilities and many more. Some brand name clients that you may have heard of are:
